ComicInfo.Series: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Too Long a Sacrifice
ComicInfo.Summary: Too Long a Sacrifice [Part 2]: In the aftermath of the bombing on the Promenade, a Bajoran official is found murdered, and then a Ferengi trade delegation is also killed. Odo and Worf investigate to find the culprit, while Sisko receives pressure from different alien factions to solve the case quickly.
